short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Know what your boyfriend is thinking with one click

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
WHAT IS WHAT IS MY BOYFRIEND THINKING?
A chrome extension for fun that can tell a girl what her boyfriend is thinking at the moment.

HOW IS IT DONE?
May be the chrome extension hacks in to a girls' boyfriend's brain to know what he is thinking.

HOW CAN I USE IT?
Your boyfriend cannot know about it. Otherwise, it won't work. This is the main rule you need to keep in mind while using the software solution. The software solution has an elegant user interface. 

You can launch it by clicking on the icon in the
extensions bar or list. Next, the app page will open where in a few seconds, you will be able to see what your boyfriend is thinking at the moment. If you click on the heart, the page will refresh. If you want to save your boyfriend's name, click on settings, and on the settings page you can save the name of your boyfriend. If you do not save your boyfriend's name, the software solution will use the pronoun "He". 
 
You can share the thought via facebook, twitter, & email. In order to share it, select it (you can triple click on it to select the entire sentence), and you will see the tiny & cute share icons. Click on your desired one to share the thought. 

FEATURES

Quick Installation
Installation will take less than 5 seconds.

Clean & Attractive User Interface
When you open the solution for the first time, 
you will definitely admire the aesthetics of the solution.

Quick Sharing Options
The solution offers quick sharing options via 3 
leading social networks, facebook, twitter, & 
gmail.

Speed
The solution takes just a few seconds to hack into your boyfriend's mind and display his thought.

Safe
The solution does not require any remote code to function.

Limited Romantic Experience Required
You don't need to have a lot of romantic experience to use the solution.

Built on Modern Frameworks
The solution uses latest stable frameworks to 
ensure the best possible user experience.

Easy Settings
It will take you less than 3 seconds to save your boyfriend's name in the settings.

Premium Support
We offer premium support for our valued customers.

FREQUENTLY ASKED QUESTIONS  

Q: How can I install it?

A: Please install it from chrome web store page.

Q: Is there any limit regarding the no. of times it can be used every day?

A: There is no limit. 

Q: How can I share my boyfriend's thought on social media?

A: Select the thought to see the social media options and share.

Q: Will my boyfriend fall ill if the solution hacks into his mind?

A: No. 

Q: Who is the software solution for?

A: It is for girls.
